desc.en: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，尼禄提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉音创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，宁瑠提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，妮露提出一项作战方案。

desc.en: The all contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.jp: The all contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.zh_cn: 众人联系了优香等人，优香听闻爱丽丝被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研讨会请求帮助，希望能确认爱丽丝的具体所在地。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to their stance.
desc.jp: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to their stance.
desc.zh_cn: 不出老师所料，优香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“埃里都”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千禧年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程师部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程师部为何会愿意参与此事，咏叶则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程师部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.jp: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。尼禄罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。真理社则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了季当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。宁瑠罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程师部趁机救出即可。贝里塔斯则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。妮露罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。真理会则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.jp: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 被莉央监禁的日鞠。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 被莉音监禁的阳葵。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程师部遇见了莉音创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 被莉央监禁的日鞠。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。

desc.en: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.jp: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员时阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员季阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员时阻止了势如破竹的他们。

desc.en: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris just to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the security system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.jp: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris just to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the security system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠对莉央将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉央则仍希望日鞠能理解她，并表示日鞠和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵对莉音将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉音则仍希望阳葵能理解她，并表示阳葵和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠对莉央将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉央则仍希望日鞠能理解她，并表示日鞠和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

hobby.jp: 今日の運勢の確認、オカルト全般
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The Engineering Department, Game Development Department and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department, Game Development Department and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部、游戏开发部和老师安全抵达都市的地下货运通道，对真理社的黑客技术大为震撼。这时一群AMAS机器人挡住了他们的去路，众人立刻开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程师部、游戏开发部和老师安全抵达都市的地下货运通道，对贝里塔斯的黑客技术大为震撼。这时一群AMAS机器人挡住了他们的去路，众人立刻开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部、游戏开发部和老师安全抵达都市的地下货运通道，对真理会的黑客技术大为震撼。这时一群AMAS机器人挡住了他们的去路，众人立刻开始迎战。
